body:
Hello everyone, 



I'm trying to run a very simple daylight analysis, but I have an issue with the calcul of daylight autonomy : " 1. Number of points in ill files: -3 doesn't match the number of points in point files: 3248".

I can't fix this, can you help me please (file attached)?

Ilona
topic: Error with HB - Read annual result component

replies.body:
Hi Ilona,



The simulation you are running is point in time illuminance. In order to get .ill files for daylight autonomy, you need to run the Honeybee_Annual_Daylight_Simulation instead. 

Then you can use the Honeybee_Lookup Daylight Folder component which will give you the location of the .ill files.



I hope this helps.



Byron
